statements: SELECT * FROM policy_impact_analysis WHERE impact_score > 0.5;
SELECT policy_id, demographic_group, impact_score FROM policy_impact_analysis WHERE demographic_group = 'Senior Citizens';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM policy_impact_analysis;
SELECT SUM(impact_score) FROM policy_impact_analysis WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT demographic_group, AVG(impact_score) AS average_score FROM policy_impact_analysis GROUP BY demographic_group ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_impact_analysis WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY demographic_group DESC, impact_score ASC;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(impact_score) AS avg_score FROM policy_impact_analysis WHERE demographic_group = 'Adults' GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_impact_analysis WHERE impact_score > 0.6 AND demographic_group IN ('Children', 'Seniors') ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) AS group_count FROM policy_impact_analysis GROUP BY policy_id HAVING group_count > 2;
SELECT MAX(impact_score) AS max_score, MIN(impact_score) AS min_score FROM policy_impact_analysis;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes;
SELECT policy_name, policy_effect, policy_id FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_effect = 'positive';
SELECT policy_name, demographic_group FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT demographic_group, population_size FROM demographic_data ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT demographic_group, average_income FROM demographic_data WHERE average_income > 50000;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, demographic_group, policy_effect FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_name LIKE '%health%';
SELECT demographic_id, demographic_group, population_size FROM demographic_data ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, demographic_group, policy_effect FROM policy_changes WHERE demographic_group = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT demographic_id, demographic_group, average_income FROM demographic_data WHERE average_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, age, income FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT description, enacted_date FROM policy_changes WHERE impact_score > 5;
SELECT demographic_id, effect, analysis_date FROM demographic_impact WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, gender FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE enacted_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY enacted_date;
SELECT id, description FROM policy_changes WHERE impact_score > 75 ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_impact WHERE effect LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policy_changes WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT group_name, description, total_population FROM demographic_groups ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT d.name, dg.group_name, ia.impact_score FROM demographic_data d JOIN impact_analysis ia ON d.id = ia.demographic_id JOIN demographic_groups dg ON ia.demographic_id = dg.id;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE ethnicity='Hispanic' AND age >= 30;
SELECT demographic_data.name, impact_analysis.impact_score, impact_analysis.impact_description FROM demographic_data JOIN impact_analysis ON demographic_data.id = impact_analysis.demographic_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policy_changes WHERE description LIKE '%impact%' AND id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM impact_analysis WHERE impact_score > 5);
SELECT * FROM PolicyChanges;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM PolicyChanges WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, group_name FROM Users JOIN DemographicGroups ON Users.group_id = DemographicGroups.group_id;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, impact_value FROM PolicyChanges JOIN PolicyImpact ON PolicyChanges.policy_id = PolicyImpact.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM PolicyChanges WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, feedback_text FROM Users INNER JOIN UserFeedback ON Users.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id;
SELECT user_name, group_name FROM Users INNER JOIN DemographicGroups ON Users.group_id = DemographicGroups.group_id;
SELECT user_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Users INNER JOIN UserFeedback ON Users.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
